mapper.sql: ID, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, COMPANY_PWD, COMPANY_CODE, PAY_TYPE, ENTRY_TIME, MONTH_CODE, SEND_SITE, IS_DEFAULT, ORG_ID
mapper.insert: insert into KDI_COMPANY (ID, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, COMPANY_PWD, COMPANY_CODE, PAY_TYPE, ENTRY_TIME, MONTH_CODE, SEND_SITE, IS_DEFAULT, ORG_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{monthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update KDI_COMPANY
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_PWD = #{companyPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ENTRY_TIME = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MONTH_CODE = #{monthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_SITE = #{sendSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update KDI_COMPANY set COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_PWD = #{companyPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ENTRY_TIME = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MONTH_CODE = #{monthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_SITE = #{sendSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, COMPANY_PWD, COMPANY_CODE, PAY_TYPE, ENTRY_TIME, MONTH_CODE, SEND_SITE, IS_DEFAULT, ORG_ID from KDI_COMPANY
mapper.update: update KDI_COMPANY SET IS_DEFAULT=true where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update KDI_COMPANY SET IS_DEFAULT=false where ID != #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
